snippet: Six decades after the end of World War II, German officials believe that a recent legal victory may make it easier for them to bring former death camp guards up on charges.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

lead_paragraph: Six decades after the end of World War II, German officials believe that a recent legal victory may make it easier for them to bring former death camp guards up on charges.

headline.main: Germans Weigh More Charges for Nazi Guards
headline.print_headline: Germans Weigh More Charges For Nazi Guards
headline.seo: Nazi Death Camp Guards May Face Charges
